testcase.classname: Medicine flow to check and place the order
testcase.name: Search the any of the Product and add into the Cart and Place the Order
testcase.system-out: Given Check Already Logged in Browser was Opened............................passed When Clear the Cart and Search the Product.................................passed And click on Add to the cart and add the product............................passed And Click on cart page proceed the Product to Order Page....................passed Then From Order page choose delivery adress and click on Pay................passed And check Payment page was landed...........................................passed And Verify the payment status of the order..................................passed
